statements: DELETE FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 123 AND last_accessed < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM learning_paths WHERE last_accessed <= '2021-12-31' AND student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM learning_paths WHERE learning_path->'subject' = 'Math');
DELETE FROM progress WHERE progress_id = 100 AND completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM progress WHERE student_id = 2 AND completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 2;
DELETE FROM progress WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 2;
